Description: Is ritonavir  100mg and lopinavir400mg are safe drugs in COVID-19 and is improvement appear in patient??
DialogueText:
Patient:
Is ritonavir  100mg and lopinavir400mg are safe drugs in COVID-19 and is improvement appear in patient??
Doctor:
In brief:   No   There is not enough data to support it's use.   More clinical trials are needed  Would you like to video or text chat with me?
